## ðŸš€ Quick Start

1. Fork repository and clone project

    ```bash
    $ git clone https://github.com/<your-username>/developers-blog.git developers-blog
    $ cd developers-blog
    ```

1. Install dependencies

    ```bash
    $ yarn install --no-dev
    ```

1. Start your app

    ```bash
    $ yarn start
    ```
